dublin_core.dcvalue: Online patient portals which provide patients with personal information and facilitate electronic doctor patient communication can help patients manage chronic diseases These systems will be most beneficial if they have broad and durable appeal In a randomized trial we compared a portal providing generic diabetes self management information to one providing personalized information Diabetes STAR We assessed 1 the characteristics of patient users and 2 whether including personalized content promotes sustained use
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Adoption and use of an online patient portal for diabetes (Diabetes-STAR).
